EmailTemplate.description: The email response to someone filling out the SOI - Register form
EmailTemplate.name: State of Independence.SOI - Register
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners' Index Sign-up Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Thank you for your interest in our Independent Workforce Index. We invite you to view a copy of our report <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/docs/MBO-Partners-Independent-Workforce-Index-2011.pdf>, study infographic <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/who-are-the-independents.html>, and slides <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/docs/MBO-Partners-Independent-Workforce-Index-Key-Findings-Summary.pdf>. We also recently revealed a new, Boomer-focused report <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/docs/MBO-Boomer-Report-2012.pdf> available here.
If you would like to learn more about the services MBO Partners provides independent consultants and contractors, please call us at 800-220-0469, email us at info@mbopartners.com or visit our web site at www.mbopartners.com. We look forward to hearing from you.
Best Regards,
MBO Partners www.mbopartners.com
